data.message: You're my hero. I don't give a fuck what anyone else says or thinks about you selling out. If you have  fuck it and fuck them too. You've earnt what you have and you were entitled to nothing. Don't let em say you ain't beautiful, they can all get fucked just stay true to you.

replies.message: You have some serious grammar issues.  Furthermore you are a complete and total idiot.
Thomas Fedorko I'd rather been an idiot with grammar issues than you... Whoever the fuck you are..  You're equally as idiotic for thinking your opinion or existance was somehow relevant here...

Wow. So eloquent. The problem with people like you is the complete lack of ability to communicate on an even remotely intelligent level.  You're the problem with our country.  If you're so intelligent and such a bad ass, I'll give you my personal address.  Sycophant.
Chris Worrell is a total and complete moron.  Come see me child.  I will learn you real quick. Like I said. I'll give you my address.  Bitch.
